House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To amend the Foreign Trade Zones Act to renew the existing customs exemption applicable to bicycle parts, not reexported, in foreign trade zones.

summary.text: Amends the Foreign Trade Zones Act to extend until December 31, 1996, the exclusion of bicycle component parts from the exemption from customs laws provided by such Act.

titles.title: To amend the Foreign Trade Zones Act to renew the existing customs exemption applicable to bicycle parts, not reexported, in foreign trade zones.
